item.title: We won’t forget
item.dc:creator: rimshot.ch
item.description:
„You reached for the secret too soon You cried for the moon Shine on you crazy diamond Threatened by shadows at night And exposed in the light Shine on you crazy diamond Well, you wore out your welcome With random precision Rode on the steel breeze Come on you raver You seer of visions Come...

The post We won’t forget appeared first on David Emanuel.
item.content:encoded:
„You reached for the secret too soon
You cried for the moon
Shine on you crazy diamond
Threatened by shadows at night
And exposed in the light
Shine on you crazy diamond
Well, you wore out your welcome
With random precision
Rode on the steel breeze
Come on you raver
You seer of visions
Come on you painter
You piper
You prisoner
And shine“ (Pink Floyd)

Shine on, crazy diamond, wherever you are by now. We won’t forget!

The post We won’t forget appeared first on David Emanuel.
